attributes.name: Travel Planner
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Travel Planner card for trip organization and management in the Boxel framework. This card should help travelers plan, organize, and track their journeys with detailed itineraries, budget management, booking coordination, and travel document organization for seamless trip experiences.

## Core Fields

### Trip Information
- **tripName**: StringField - Trip title or nickname
- **destination**: StringField - Primary destination
- **additionalDestinations**: containsMany(Destination) - Multi-city trips
- **tripType**: StringField with enum: "vacation", "business", "family-visit", "adventure", "romantic", "solo", "group"
- **startDate**: DateField - Departure date
- **endDate**: DateField - Return date
- **duration**: NumberField - Trip length in days (computed)
- **travelers**: containsMany(Traveler) - Who's going
- **tripStatus**: StringField with enum: "planning", "booked", "confirmed", "in-progress", "completed", "cancelled"

### Itinerary Planning
- **dailySchedule**: containsMany(DayPlan) - Day-by-day activities
- **activities**: containsMany(Activity) - Tours, attractions, events
- **restaurants**: containsMany(Restaurant) - Dining reservations
- **transportation**: containsMany(Transportation) - Flights, trains, rentals
- **accommodations**: containsMany(Accommodation) - Hotels, rentals, stays
- **freeTime**: containsMany(FreeTimeBlock) - Unscheduled periods
- **backupPlans**: containsMany(BackupPlan) - Alternative activities

### Budget Management
- **totalBudget**: NumberField - Overall trip budget
- **budgetBreakdown**: contains(BudgetCategories) - Category allocations
- **expenses**: containsMany(Expense) - Actual spending tracking
- **remainingBudget**: NumberField - Budget left (computed)
- **currency**: StringField - Primary currency
- **exchangeRates**: containsMany(ExchangeRate) - Currency conversions
- **sharedExpenses**: containsMany(SharedExpense) - Group cost splitting
- **emergencyFund**: NumberField - Contingency money

### Bookings & Reservations
- **flights**: containsMany(FlightBooking) - Air travel details
- **hotels**: containsMany(HotelBooking) - Accommodation reservations
- **carRentals**: containsMany(CarRental) - Vehicle bookings
- **tours**: containsMany(TourBooking) - Guided tour reservations
- **shows**: containsMany(Entertainment) - Theater, concerts, events
- **dining**: containsMany(DiningReservation) - Restaurant bookings
- **confirmationNumbers**: containsMany(Confirmation) - Booking references

### Travel Documents
- **passport**: contains(PassportInfo) - Passport details and expiry
- **visas**: containsMany(Visa) - Required travel visas
- **travelInsurance**: contains(Insurance) - Coverage details
- **tickets**: containsMany(Ticket) - Physical/digital tickets
- **emergencyContacts**: containsMany(EmergencyContact) - Important numbers
- **medicalInfo**: contains(MedicalInformation) - Health requirements
- **vaccinations**: containsMany(Vaccination) - Required immunizations

### Packing & Preparation
- **packingLists**: containsMany(PackingList) - Items to bring
- **weatherForecast**: contains(WeatherInfo) - Expected conditions
- **culturalInfo**: contains(CulturalGuide) - Local customs and etiquette
- **languagePhrases**: containsMany(Phrase) - Useful local language
- **currencyInfo**: contains(CurrencyInfo) - Local money information
- **timeZone**: StringField - Destination time zone
- **plugAdapters**: StringField - Electrical outlet requirements

### Social & Sharing
- **travelCompanions**: linksToMany(TravelBuddy) - Fellow travelers
- **recommendations**: containsMany(Recommendation) - Friend suggestions
- **sharedItinerary**: BooleanField - Visible to travel group
- **travelJournal**: contains(Journal) - Trip diary and photos
- **socialSharing**: contains(SharingSettings) - Privacy preferences
- **meetupPlans**: containsMany(Meetup) - Meeting friends/family

### Safety & Emergency
- **emergencyPlans**: contains(EmergencyPlan) - Safety procedures
- **localLaws**: contains(LegalInfo) - Important regulations
- **healthSafety**: contains(HealthInfo) - Medical facilities, warnings
- **embassyInfo**: contains(Embassy) - Consulate contact information
- **travelAlerts**: containsMany(TravelAlert) - Government advisories
- **safetyCheckins**: containsMany(CheckIn) - Regular status updates

## Required Component Cards

### DayPlan Card
Create a separate DayPlan card with:
- **date**: DateField - Specific day
- **location**: StringField - Primary location for the day
- **morning**: contains(TimeBlock) - Morning activities
- **afternoon**: contains(TimeBlock) - Afternoon activities
- **evening**: contains(TimeBlock) - Evening activities
- **meals**: containsMany(MealPlan) - Breakfast, lunch, dinner
- **transportation**: containsMany(TransportMethod) - How getting around
- **notes**: MarkdownField - Daily notes and reminders
- **weather**: StringField - Expected weather
- **budget**: NumberField - Daily spending limit

### FlightBooking Card
- **airline**: StringField - Carrier name
- **flightNumber**: StringField - Flight identifier
- **confirmationCode**: StringField - Booking reference
- **departureAirport**: StringField - Origin airport code
- **arrivalAirport**: StringField - Destination airport code
- **departureTime**: DateTimeField - Takeoff time
- **arrivalTime**: DateTimeField - Landing time
- **seatNumber**: StringField - Assigned seat
- **baggage**: contains(BaggageInfo) - Checked/carry-on allowances
- **price**: NumberField - Ticket cost
- **checkinStatus**: StringField - Not checked in, checked in

### Expense Card
- **date**: DateField - Purchase date
- **category**: StringField - Food, transport, activities, shopping
- **description**: StringField - What was purchased
- **amount**: NumberField - Cost in local currency
- **currency**: StringField - Currency used
- **convertedAmount**: NumberField - Cost in home currency
- **paymentMethod**: StringField - Cash, card, digital
- **receipt**: contains(ImageField) - Photo of receipt
- **splitWith**: linksToMany(Traveler) - Shared expense partners
- **notes**: StringField - Additional expense details

## Computed Fields Logic

### Budget Utilization
Calculate percentage of budget spent across categories.

### Trip Progress
Track how much of the trip has been completed.

### Cost Per Day
Average daily spending rate based on actual expenses.

### Itinerary Density
Measure how packed the schedule is per day.

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design a travel-focused planning interface:

**Header Section**
- Trip name and destination prominently displayed
- Travel dates and duration
- Trip progress indicator
- Quick status overview (bookings confirmed, budget status)
- Weather widget for destination

**Navigation Tabs**
- **Overview**: Trip summary and key information
- **Itinerary**: Day-by-day schedule
- **Bookings**: All reservations and confirmations
- **Budget**: Financial planning and tracking
- **Documents**: Travel papers and requirements
- **Packing**: Lists and preparation

**Trip Dashboard**
- **Quick Stats**:
  - Days until departure
  - Budget spent vs. remaining
  - Bookings confirmed
  - Items packed
  - Weather forecast
  
- **Today's Plan** (during trip):
  - Current day's schedule
  - Next activity
  - Transportation details
  - Restaurant reservations

**Itinerary Timeline**
- Visual day-by-day schedule
- Activity blocks with times
- Transportation connections
- Meal planning
- Free time indicators

**Booking Center**
- Flight details with check-in status
- Hotel confirmations
- Rental car information
- Tour and activity bookings
- Restaurant reservations

**Budget Tracker**
- Category spending visualization
- Daily expense entry
- Currency conversion
- Shared expense tracking
- Budget alerts and warnings

### Mobile Travel View
- Offline-accessible itinerary
- Quick expense entry
- Document scanner
- GPS integration for locations
- Emergency contact access

### Group Travel View
- Shared itinerary editing
- Group expense splitting
- Voting on activities
- Communication hub
- Role assignments

## Interactive Features

### Smart Scheduling
- Automatic travel time calculations
- Optimal route planning
- Activity recommendation engine
- Weather-based suggestions
- Crowd-level optimization

### Real-time Updates
- Flight delay notifications
- Weather alerts
- Currency rate updates
- Local event suggestions
- Travel advisory updates

### Collaboration Tools
- Group planning features
- Shared expense tracking
- Activity voting
- Role assignment
- Communication integration

## Styling Requirements
- Travel-inspired design with destination imagery
- Map integration and geographic visualization
- Currency and time zone displays
- Weather condition indicators
- Progress tracking visualizations
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Offline functionality styling
- Multi-language support

## Validation Rules
- Travel dates logical progression
- Budget allocations sum correctly
- Flight times and time zones accurate
- Passport/visa expiry dates valid
- Activity times don't conflict
- Currency amounts positive
- Confirmation codes format validation
- Emergency contact information complete

## Integration Points
- **Booking Platforms**: Expedia, Booking.com, Kayak
- **Airlines**: Direct airline booking systems
- **Maps**: Google Maps, Apple Maps for navigation
- **Weather**: AccuWeather, Weather.com
- **Currency**: XE.com, bank exchange rates
- **Travel Guides**: TripAdvisor, Lonely Planet
- **Translation**: Google Translate, language apps
- **Banking**: Travel credit cards, expense tracking
- **Government**: State Department travel advisories
- **Insurance**: Travel insurance providers

## Business Logic Requirements
- Intelligent itinerary optimization
- Automatic booking confirmation parsing
- Smart expense categorization
- Currency conversion and tracking
- Travel document expiry monitoring
- Weather-based activity suggestions
- Budget alert and warning systems
- Group coordination and communication
- Offline data synchronization
- Travel safety monitoring
- Booking change management
- Post-trip expense reporting
- Travel pattern analysis
- Loyalty program integration
